form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT, 4458

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/31/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE GPO 1974-538-377 Immigration and Naturalization Service APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT Form Approved O.M.B. No. 43-R0400 FEE STAMP File No. Bas97295 APPLICATION FOR THE BENEFITS OF SECTION: Sec. 203(a)(7) and Sec. 245, I&N Act Sec. 245, I&N Act U.S. JUN 3 0.1978 MED Sec. 214(d), I&N Act Sec. 249, I&N Act Sec. 13, Act of 9/11/57 (DO NOT WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE.) (SEE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE FILLING IN APPLICATION. IF YOU NEED MORE SPACE TO ANSWER FULLY ANY QUESTION ON THIS FORM, USE A SEPARATE SHEET AND IDENTIFY EACH ANSWER WITH THE NUMBER OF THE CORRESPONDING QUESTION FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) 1. I hereby apply for the status of a lawful permanent resident alien on the following basis: (Check box A. B. C. D. E. or F) A. As a refugee to whom an immigrant visa is immediately available (Section 203(a)(7) and Section 245, I&N Act). B. As a person who entered the U.S. with a visa issued to me as the fiancee or fiance of a U.S. citizen whom I married within 90 days after my entry, or as a child of such fiancee or fiance (Sec. 214(d), I&N Act). C. As a former government official, or as a member of the immediate family of such official (Section 13, Act of September 11, 1957). D. As a person to whom an immigrant visa is immediately available, other than one described above (Section 245, I&N Act). E. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since prior to July 1, 1924 (Section 249, I&N Act). F. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since a date on or after July 1, 1924, but before June 30, 1948 (Section 249, I&N Act). My name is (Last in capital letters) (First Name) (Middle Name) 3. Sex MASIH ASHRITA ZAHOOR Male Female 4. I reside in the United States at: (c/o) (No. and Street) (Apt. No.) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) 5 Have you ever applied before for permanent resident 8 BURNING TREE ROAD, NATICK, MASS. 01760 status in the U.S.? Yes No 60 My alien registration number I am a citizen of (Country) 8. Date of Birth (If "Yes", give the date and place of filing and is A22106234 02/08/1910 final disposition.) INDIA 9. Place of Birth (City or Town) (County, Province, or State) (Country) APRIL 1974 CALGARY, BILASPUR, M.P. INDIA. ALBERTA, CANADA 10. Name as appears on nonimmigrant document (Form I-94) DID NOT HEAR ANYTHING MASIH ASHRITA ZAHOOR As YET. last arrived in the/United States at the port of (City and State) on (Month) (Day) (Year) by (Name of vessel or other means of travel) NEW YORK N.Y. 03 18 76 AIR INDIA as a (visitor, student, crewman, parolee. etc.) T my I-94 permit number is 11. My nonimmigrant visa, number 002295 was issued by the on (Month) 35 (Day) (Year) DEPENDENT VISITOR 038 42 I was was not inspected. 12. I am single married United States Consul at (City)(Country) MADRAS,INDIA 02/26/76 divorced widowed 13. I have been married / times, including my present marriage, if now married. (If you are now married give the following:) a. Number of times my husband or wife has been married b. Name of husband or wife (Wife give maiden name) c. My husband or wife resides with me apart from me at Address (Apt. No.)(No. & Street)(Town or City)(Province) or State) (Country) 14. a. I have 2 sons or daughters as follows: (Complete all columns as to each son or daughter; if living with you state "with me" in last column; otherwise give city and state or country of son's or daughter's residence). Name Sex Place of Birth Date of Birth Now living at DR. S.Z. MASIH M PENDRA, INDIA. 04/06/1934 8 BURNING TREE RD, NATICK, MASS MR. S.P. MASIH M " - 11 12/30/1945 1567 CATHEL ROAD, PITTSBURGH, PA.
